mdRecord.dcterms:title: Jacob Epperly Home
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 143_OldAddisonEpperlyBirthHome Lonie,Bretherd, Theotis, Fannie, Willie, Calvin, Dove, Peter, and Addison and Alice Epperly; Jacob Epperly - father; Belle, Aunt Lizzie, Stella Brammer; Peggy Phlegar; Haden and Lindy Epperly with Lorena and Lillie; Eva with neice; three children; Aiken
